title: Spicy Shrimp Pasta
description: Quick and flavorful pasta dish with succulent shrimp.
ingredients: Penne pasta, large shrimp, garlic, cherry tomatoes, red pepper flakes, olive oil, parmesan cheese

title: Roasted Vegetable Soup
description: Comforting soup made with roasted vegetables and aromatic spices.
ingredients: Carrots, celery, onions, potatoes, garlic, vegetable broth, coconut milk, thyme
note: Blend for a creamy texture if desired.

title: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: Fresh mix of greens, grilled chicken, and tangy dressing.
ingredients: Mixed greens, boneless chicken breast, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, balsamic vinaigrette
note: Use leftover chicken for added convenience.

title: Baked Salmon with Lemon
description: Simple yet elegant fish dish with bright citrus flavors.
ingredients: Salmon fillets, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, parsley, salt, pepper
note: Serve with quinoa and steamed vegetables.

title: Veggie Stir-Fry
description: Quick and versatile stir-fry with colorful vegetables.
ingredients: Broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, onions, garlic, soy sauce, vegetable oil
note: Add protein like tofu or chicken for extra nutrition.

title: Homemade Pizza
description: Classic Italian dish made fresh at home.
ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, basil

title: Chickpea Curry
description: Flavorful and nutritious curry made with chickpeas and aromatic spices.
ingredients: Chickpeas, coconut milk, onion, ginger, garlic, cumin, coriander, turmeric
note: Serve over rice or with naan bread.

title: Breakfast Burrito
description: Hearty breakfast wrapped in a flour tortilla.
ingredients: Scrambled eggs, black beans, cheddar cheese, salsa, avocado, flour tortillas
note: Add cooked sausage or bacon for extra protein.

title: Quinoa Salad Bowl
description: Nutritious bowl filled with quinoa, vegetables, and a tangy dressing.
ingredients: Cooked quinoa, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, carrots, feta cheese, lemon-tahini dressing
note: Customize toppings based on seasonal produce.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Flavorful tacos filled with seasoned beef and fresh toppings.
ingredients: Ground beef, taco seasoning, lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, tortillas
note: Serve with homemade salsa for extra flavor.
